polyclip-go test program
========================

Introduction
------------
This application can be used to test the `polyclip-go` library.  The program is cross compiled and can be run on different operating systems to test different polygon details.

- Cross compiled code is in `./cross_compiled_bin`.
- Results of some basic tests are in `./results`.

Usage
-----
```
$ ./polycliptest -h
Usage of ./polycliptest:
  -add_right_circle=false: add an additional circle on the right side of the rectangle
  -radius=8: the radius of the circles at the ends of the slot
  -segments=1: the number of segments per 1/4 circle at the ends of the slot
```

Working Examples
----------------
```
$ ./polycliptest
=> the result is in the file ./results/polycliptest_default_ok.svg
```

```
$ ./polycliptest -segments=3
=> the result is in the file ./results/polycliptest_seg-3_ok.svg
```

```
$ ./polycliptest -add_right_circle
=> the result is in the file ./results/polycliptest_default_add_ok.svg
```

Failing Example
---------------
```
$ ./polycliptest -segments=15
=> the result is in the file ./results/polycliptest_seg-15_fails.svg
```

Here are some additional details for this failing example:

